name: A Knight and a Baby
description:
Protect the Out of Control Baby from the Evil Goblins. The Baby Will walk around randomly and you must kill any Goblins going toward the baby.

You use the WASD keys to move and the Left click button to attack.

The game was made for the GMTK Game Jam with the theme of out of contol.

This Game was late because I have never exported a project before.
